arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Post-Match Press Conference After Real Madrid Beat Levante in La Liga
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso was pleased with the performance, but said it's just the beginning with more to come from his team. Alonso: Having quality players makes it a lot easier, as they understand the idea and what we want with little training; they are flexible, they can play not just one way but in different ways, and even in different positions.

arts.ttl: European football: Vinicíus and Mbappé lead Real Madrid in rout of Levante
arts.sum: Both players on target in 4-1 win for La Liga leaders Nkunku strikes as Milan sink Lecce in Coppa Italia Real Madrid maintained their flawless start to the Spanish league season with a swashbuckling 4-1 victory at Levante on Tuesday. Vinícius Júnior orchestrated the visitors’ first-half display before Kylian Mbappe’s second-half double, including a penalty, sealed a comprehensive win. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: The Vini Jr show: Real star shines alongside Mbappe as Levante dismantled
arts.sum: Real Madrid continue their perfect start to the season with a 4-1 win in La Liga against Levante at Estadio Ciudad de Valencia on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Levante 1-4 Real Madrid: Report & Full Match Highlights as Mbappe Stays Hot
arts.sum: Seven minutes before half-time, Real Madrid doubled their lead thanks to Franco Mastantuono's first goal for the club. Despite all the possession falling to Real Madrid, it was Levante with the first big chance, when poor defending gifted an opportunity to Ivan Romero, who pulled his shot just past the far post.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid Player Ratings vs. Levante: Vinicius Junior Silences Critics in 4–1 Victory
arts.sum: Vinícius Júnior and Kylian Mbappé each ended the match with two goal contributions to their name.
